"【調査依頼おまかせあれ！】<br>仮テキスト": "Hello there! Patty here, is there anything you're having trouble with?"
"She's still a little influenced by the person she met before. Tea here."
"It looks like there's something you actually want to ask. Go ahead ask me anything!"
"About the accident at the Research Facility."
"The Research Division at ARKS. You gave information about it before."
"Hm? Did I really talk about something like that? I can't remember."
"But I guess if you say I did, then I probably did."
"Hm, the accident at the research division?"
"There was an accident? I can't recall anything like that."
"There was, you were the one who told <%me> about it!"
"Oh-? Right! I know what you're talking about now!"
"I see, so about the ARKS Research Facility, you have your eye on some dangerous information."
"The ARKS Research Facility is top secret. We might be able to get our hands on some info, but it's a risk."
"Even so, the words \"impossible\" don't exist in our dictionary."
"Plus since you ask there's no way we could turn you down. Let's go Tea!"
"Patty wait, \"impossible\" is one word, you idiot!"
"Anyway, we'll do our best to try and get some information for you. See you next time."
